lyrics:
[Chorus]
I still love you, babe
(It ain't ever gonna change, baby, that's real)
I'm still for you, girl
(On the DM, baby)
I'll never leave you, baby (Nah)
'Cause I realize I need you in my life (I need you)

[Verse 1]
Girl, it just ain't right
What we said last night
'Cause I know we didn't mean it (Nah, baby)
You feel the love is gone (Yeah)
'Cause we don't get along
But I can prove you wrong
Girl, I swear

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause every time I close my eyes, I see you (I see you)
And how I wanna live my life is with you
There is no one
You're all I need and all I want
The only one I'll ever love

[Chorus]
I still love you, babe
(It's all about you)
('Cause without you there's no me)
I'm still for you, girl
(I love you, girl)
(Even though we disagree sometimes)
I'll never leave you, baby
(Let's make it right)
(I'll never leave you, baby)
'Cause I realize I need you in my life (I need you)
[Verse 2]
In this relationship we spend alot of time
Now it would be wrong if everything was always fine
Girl, I know we've had our shares of ups and downs (I know, baby)
But it doesn't mean that we can't work this out
Oh baby girl, I care, yeah
You know I do (I love you, girl)

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause every time I close my eyes, I see you (I see you)
And how I wanna live my life with you, oh
There is no one else
You're all I need and all I want
The only one I'll ever love, yeah

[Chorus]
I still love you, babe
('Cause without you there's no me) (Nah)
I'm still for you, girl
(Even though we disagree sometimes)
I'll never leave you, baby
(I love you) (I'll never leave you, baby)
'Cause I realize I need you in my life (I need you)
(No, oh girl, I know I need ya, baby)

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause every time I close my eyes, I see you
And how I wanna live my life with you
There is no one else
You're all I want and all I'll need
The only one I'll ever love
[Chorus]
I still love you, babe
('Cause without you there's no me)
I'm still for you, girl
(Even though we disagree sometimes)
I'll never leave you, baby
(I'll never leave you, baby)
'Cause I realize I need you in my life
(I realize, I realize, yeah)
I still love you, babe
(I realize, I realize I need you)
I'm still for you, girl
(And there ain't nothin' I won't do for you)
I'll never leave you, baby
(You can always count on me because)
'Cause I realize I need you in my life
(I realize I need you in my life)
I still love you, babe
(Baby, there ain't nothin' I won't do)
I'm still for you, girl
(It's all about you) (Girl, it's all, girl, it's all about you)
I'll never leave you, baby
(I'll be right here because I realize)
'Cause I realize I need you in my life

[Outro]
Next, 9-7, y'all
